description.content: We provided payment methods configuration that allow our sellers to configure installment options and from that configuration we generate an installment service.
Returns the best installment options according to the informed params.
(Required)
Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL
(Required) The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
(Required) The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
(Required) The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
(Required) The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
(Required) The Media type of the body of the request.  Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json
(Required) Media type(s) that is/are acceptable for the response. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json

description.content: This is meant to explain the requests that are necessary to complete a transaction using PCI Gateway.
This request is the first step to create a new transaction.
Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL
(Required) The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

>ℹ️ Onboarding guide
>
> Check the new [Payments onboarding guide](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/payments-overview). We created this guide to improve the onboarding experience for developers at VTEX. It assembles all documentation on our Developer Portal about Payments and is organized by focusing on the developer's journey.

The Payments Gateway API allows you to get payment data and process your store's transactions.
